name: Cream Cheese Glaze
description: Take cakes, pound cakes, breads, cookies, breakfast rolls & more to the next level with luxuriously creamy 4 ingredient cream cheese glaze!
ingredients: 1 cup powdered sugar sifted if clumpy
instructions: In a large mixing bowl or stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, add cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar and vanilla extract. Beat on low, gradually increasing speed until smooth and free of clumps. Transfer to a microwave safe carafe, jar or large measuring cup, warm 20 seconds in the microwave or over low on the stovetop, stir and pour on top of your favorite desserts and breakfast pastries.
